nodes.bodyText: We have a test that verifies all XML config examples work and are valid. It is called testAllXmlExamples. Why did it not catch this? There is a second issue on why it didn't flag this.

We have had this validation for long time. I believe it was the first XDoc validation I created.
It validates XDoc, not javadoc from your example. The XDoc/Javadoc test will sync up the xdoc in it's run.
There is a secondary issue for why the example error was not found.

  
    
      checkstyle/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/internal/XdocsPagesTest.java
    
    
         Line 362
      in
      de2f537
    
    
    
    

        
          
           final NodeList sources = document.getElementsByTagName("source"); 
        
    
  


All XML examples are suppose to be in source while this one is in a div and pre. This is why validation didn't catch it.
We should fix the source tag here, and then examine how we can ensure all examples are in source and nothing else.
@rnveach , I moved your comment to #9012 and provided possible solution , please allow to merge this PR.
